article.title: The RECON Pilot Project: A Progress Report
article.author: Avram, Henriette D.
article.text: A synthesis of the progress report submitted by the Library of Congress to the Council on Library Resources under an Officer's Grant to initiate the RECON Pilot Project that gives an overview of the project and the progress made from August-November 1969 in the following areas: training, selection of material to be converted, investigation of input devices, and format recognition..
